author: nspiegelberg
msg: Summary:The tool first creates a list of directories and puts them into a file in the HDFS root directory. This file is used as the input to the mappers, there are no reducers. Each mapper processes the directory it receives as input.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Fixed minor bug where metrics weren't persisting after the first reset.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Add writeSize variable to JMX so we can track average write sizes and see how
closely they correlate with put latency

author: nspiegelberg
msg: fix build failure: delete test which is no longer relevant
MinorCompactStoreScanner.java has been removed and minor compactions basically implement minor compaction logic.
The corresponding test file also needs to be removed. We are having build issues otherwise.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Unify the code path for major/minor compaction.
Initial diff, with some tests added to testCompaction.
Added a test to testCompaction. Need to extend further to test other forms of
running all the tests to make sure this change doesn't break anything else.
